drive_link.text:
This channel has its own private Google Drive folder.

Only members of the channel can view its contents.

Invite other members into this channel to give them access!

drive_warning.text:
*DO NOT SHARE FILES BY LINK IN THIS FOLDER!*

Type `/dsa drive` to view this message again.

leave_channel.text:
You will lose access to this channel's Google Drive folder soon.

Re-join the channel to gain access again.

texts.slash_error: :thinking_face: Hmm, I don't know that command...
